Neurology

Comprehensive neurology care in Ranchi with advanced EEG, NCS, and expert neurologists for accurate diagnosis and treatment

Overview

The Department of Neurology at Raj Hospitals, Ranchi, provides cutting-edge diagnosis and treatment for disorders of the brain, nerves, and muscles. Our team of highly qualified neurologists specializes in managing conditions such as stroke, epilepsy, migraine, neuropathy, Parkinson's disease, and muscle disorders. Supported by advanced neuro-diagnostic tools like EEG (Electroencephalogram) and NCS (Nerve Conduction Study), we ensure accurate detection and effective management of neurological conditions. Focused on patient comfort, efficiency, and clinical precision, Raj Hospitals continues to be a leader in neurological care across Ranchi and Jharkhand.

Why Choose Our Neurology Department

  • Modern EEG and NCS testing facilities
  • Advanced neuro-diagnostic systems with digital data monitoring
  • 24/7 emergency support for stroke and neurological care
  • Team approach involving neurologists and neurosurgeons
  • Rehabilitation and physiotherapy support

Key Facilities

Modern EEG and NCS testing facilities
Advanced neuro-diagnostic systems
24/7 emergency support for stroke care
Comfortable and safe test environment
Accurate and timely digital reporting
Skilled and trained neuro-technicians

Treatments We Offer

Comprehensive neurological care with advanced diagnostics

Stroke & Neuro-Rehabilitation

Comprehensive rehabilitation and therapy plans for patients recovering from stroke and neurological impairment.

Epilepsy Treatment & Monitoring

Specialized programs for epilepsy management including regular EEG monitoring and medication review.

Neuro Infectious Disorder

Expert management of neurological infections including Meningitis, Encephalitis, CNS Tuberculosis, and Pott's Spine.

Parkinson Disease & Atypical Parkinsonism

Specialized treatment and management for Parkinson's Disease and Atypical Parkinsonism.

Migraine & Headache Management

Advanced diagnosis and personalized treatment plans for chronic headaches and migraines.

EEG (Electroencephalogram)

A painless test to record brain's electrical activity used for diagnosing epilepsy, seizures, and sleep disorders.

Patient: Sunita

Outcome: Seizures well-controlled with targeted medication and care

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about Neurology

What conditions are treated in the Neurology Department?

We treat epilepsy, stroke, migraine, neuropathy, Parkinson's disease, multiple sclerosis, and muscle disorders among others.

What is an EEG test used for?

EEG helps record the brain's electrical activity to detect conditions like seizures, epilepsy, and sleep disorders.

What is the purpose of NCS?

Nerve Conduction Study measures how well signals pass through nerves, helping diagnose neuropathy, nerve injuries, and muscle weakness.

Are EEG and NCS painful?

No, both EEG and NCS are safe, non-invasive, and painless diagnostic procedures.
